Text: The Insubres or Insubri were a Gaulish population settled in Insubria, in what is now the Italian region of Lombardy.
Triplets:<The Insubres or Insubri
1:
--------------------
Text: Insubres:  They were the founders of Mediolanum (Milan).
Triplets:<Insubres
2:
--------------------
Text: Insubres:  Though completely Gaulish at the time of Roman conquest, they were the result of the fusion of pre-existing Ligurian and Celtic population with Gaulish tribes who had come from what is now Central Europe.
Triplets:<Insubres
